LANGUAGE.description: Button that indicates the current language of the program, represented by a flag

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_FULLSCREEN.description: Located in the upper right corner, enlarges the window across the entire screen

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_RESTORE.description: Same button as Fullscreen, restores the window to it's previous dimension

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_MINIMIZE.description: Located in the upper right corner, reduces the window to a small title and hide its contents

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_ABOUT.description: Located in the help menu, displays informations about the application

WORKSPACE_PROJECT_NOTEBOOK.description: Tool for project management and task management

WORKSPACE_BOARD_CONNECT.message: Wählen Sie ein Gerät aus, mit dem Sie eine Verbindung herstellen möchten

WORKSPACE_PROJECT_LIBRARY.description: Button that opens a modal with all the projects, with a folder icon as pictogram

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_EXIT_QUESTION.description: Select if you are sure you want to exit

EXIT.description: A button with the text exit

CHAT_JOIN_CHANNEL.description: Button uset to connect to a channel.

CHAT_NEW_CHANNEL.description: The name of the new channel

CHAT_WELCOME_ADD_CHANNEL.description: Text used when the user wants to add a new channel

CHAT_TEXT_PART_CHANNEL.message: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie diesen Kanal verlassen möchten?
CHAT_TEXT_PART_CHANNEL.description: Text of prompt that show up when the user wants to leave a channel.

CHAT_TAKEN_NAME.message: Ihrer Spitzname ist schon benutzt. Er wurde geaendert. Er ist jetzt {nickName}
CHAT_TAKEN_NAME.description: Text of notification that shows up when the user tries to use a nickname already taken.

CHAT_COULD_NOT_JOIN_CHANNEL.message: Nu vă puteți conecta pe acest canal. Alegeți altul!
CHAT_COULD_NOT_JOIN_CHANNEL.description: Text of notification that shows up when the user can not connect to a certain channel

CHAT_TITLE_DISCONNECT.description: Title of the prompt that show up when the user wants to disconnect from the server

CHAT_TEXT_DISCONNECT.message: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie den Kanal abbrechen möchten?
CHAT_TEXT_DISCONNECT.description: Text of the prompt that show up when the user wants to disconnect from the server

CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_MESSAGE.description: Notification text when the user didn't write a message.

CHAT_TITLE_WARNING.description: Title of prompt that show up when the user wants to leave a channel.

CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_NAME.message: Bitte den Name des Kanales eingeben
CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_NAME.description: Warning when the user didn't choose a channel name.

CHAT_LOGIN_TITLE.description: Text when the user is connecting to a server.

PROJECT_DASHBOARD.description: The Dashboard tab, used to send signals from a board.

DASHBOARD_SIGNAL_NAME.description: Input text area for the name of the signal

DASHBOARD_SIGNAL_DESCRIPTION.description: Input text area for additional description of the signal

DASHBOARD_SIGNAL_COLOR.description: Button used to pick the color of the signal

DASHBOARD_ADD_SIGNAL.description: Button used to add a signal graph

DASHBOARD_ADDEXTRA.description: Title of the prompt used to add a new signal

DASHBOARD_ADDLINE.description: Title of the prompt used to add a new signal

DEVICE_RPK_RUN.description: The run button for an application

DEVICE_RPK_STOP.description: The stop button for an application

DEVICE_RPK_TASK_MANAGER.description: The button for the task manager

DEVICE_RPK_PACKAGE_MANAGER.description: The button for the package manager

DEVICE_RPK_NETWORK_MANAGER.description: The button for the network manager

DEVICE_RPK_DISCONNECT.description: The disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_RPK_RESTART.description: The reboot and disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_RPK_TURNOFF.description: The power off and disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_WYAPP_RUN.description: The run button for an application

DEVICE_WYAPP_STOP.description: The stop button for an application

DEVICE_WYAPP_TASK_MANAGER.description: The button for the task manager

DEVICE_WYAPP_PACKAGE_MANAGER.description: The button for the package manager

DEVICE_WYAPP_NETWORK_MANAGER.description: The button for the network manager

DEVICE_WYAPP_DISCONNECT.description: The disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_WYAPP_RESTART.description: The reboot and disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_WYAPP_TURNOFF.description: The power off and disconnect option in the disconnect menu

NETWORK_PORT.description: Number of port for the network connection

NETWORK_USERNAME.description: Input text area for the name of the user on the raspberry pi

NETWORK_PASSWORD.description: Input text area for the password of the user on the raspberry pi

NETWORK_SHOWPASSWORD.description: Switch use to make the password visible

PROJECT_NOTEBOOK.description: The Notebook Tab, where the user can take it's own notes

PROJECT_NEW_FOLDER.description: Create a folder within a project

PROJECT_NEW_FILE.description: Create a file within a project

PROJECT_HIDE_CONSOLE.description: Button designed to hide the console

PROJECT_WELCOME_CREATE_NEW_APP.description: Button to create a new project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_IMPORT.description: Import a project from an archive

PROJECT_LIBRARY_RENAME.description: Rename a project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_DELETE.description: Delete a project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_EXPORT.description: Export a project from the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_CLONE.description: Clone a project within the workspace

PROJECT_SHELL.description: The Shell tab, opens a terminal
